main event: An observer reported seeing a round, orange object hovering in the sky over Auburn, New York, on 2 August 1955.
interesting points: The object appeared similar to a landing light,The observer described the object as bright white with no sound emitted.,The sighting lasted for 1.5 hours.,The object moved away rapidly after hovering,The observer was unable to capture any photographs of the object.
sighted object: round, orange object in the sky
witness description: The witness reported observing the object during the night.
